xsl:if: xsltproc psql/createtables.xslt .xml > createtables.sql "" -a -b -U postgres -W -d < createtables.sql xsltproc --stringparam tempFolder --stringparam dD --stringparam -u --stringparam p $'' psql/import.xslt .xml > import.sh . import.sh xsltproc psql/applyconstraints.xslt .xml > applyconstraints.sql "" -a -b -U postgres -W -d < applyconstraints.sql
